rows.label: tlk41700222_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Listen, there's no such thing as
a Driver who travels alone.

rows.label: tlk41700222_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Every Driver has Blades around to
help out with their unique knowledge
and skills, see?

rows.label: tlk41700222_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Some Blades can track footprints with
amazing precision, others can smash
huge rocks or burn up fallen trees.

rows.label: tlk41700222_01_msg0004
rows.name:
When you choose which Blades to bring
with you, you gotta consider those kind
of skills, not just who's best in a fight.
